description: Services pending with Levingston Funeral Home Port Neches. Services pending with Levingston Funeral Home Groves, Texas. Services pending with Levingston Funeral Home Groves.
text:
Caldonia Jones, 85, of Port Arthur, TX died Wednesday, May 27, 2020. Services
are pending at Hannah Funeral Home, Inc.

Eva Mae LeBlanc Frederick, 81 of Port Neches, Texas died May 25, 2020.
Services pending with Levingston Funeral Home  Port Neches.

Christopher Roccaforte, 39 of Groves, Texas died Thursday, May 21, 2020.
Services pending with Levingston Funeral Home  Groves, Texas.

Antonio "Tony" Perello, Jr., 69 of Houston, Texas died Saturday, May 16, 2020.
Services pending with Levingston Funeral Home  Groves.

Lynda Irene Barbay, 75, of Port Arthur, died Saturday, May 16, 2020. Services:
Thursday, May 28, 2:00 p.m. Greenlawn Memorial Park, 3900 Twin City Hwy.,
Groves. Broussard's, 505 North 12th Street, Nederland.

Vaughan Monroe Batiste, 63, of Port Arthur, TX, died Wednesday, May 20, 2020.
Services Thursday, May 28: Viewing 3PM to 5PM Hannah Funeral Home, Port
Arthur, TX. Burial Houston National Cemetery. Services under the direction of
Hannah Funeral Home, Inc.

The post DEATH NOTICES: May 27, 2020 appeared first on Port Arthur News.

title: DEATH NOTICES: May 27, 2020
html:
Caldonia Jones, 85, of Port Arthur, TX died Wednesday, May 27, 2020. Services are pending at Hannah Funeral Home, Inc.

Eva Mae LeBlanc Frederick, 81 of Port Neches, Texas died May 25, 2020. Services pending with Levingston Funeral Home – Port Neches.

Christopher Roccaforte, 39 of Groves, Texas died Thursday, May 21, 2020. Services pending with Levingston Funeral Home – Groves, Texas.

Antonio "Tony" Perello, Jr., 69 of Houston, Texas died Saturday, May 16, 2020. Services pending with Levingston Funeral Home – Groves.

Lynda Irene Barbay, 75, of Port Arthur, died Saturday, May 16, 2020. Services: Thursday, May 28, 2:00 p.m. Greenlawn Memorial Park, 3900 Twin City Hwy., Groves. Broussard's, 505 North 12th Street, Nederland.

Vaughan Monroe Batiste, 63, of Port Arthur, TX, died Wednesday, May 20, 2020. Services Thursday, May 28: Viewing 3PM to 5PM Hannah Funeral Home, Port Arthur, TX. Burial Houston National Cemetery. Services under the direction of Hannah Funeral Home, Inc.

The post DEATH NOTICES: May 27, 2020 appeared first on Port Arthur News.
